title: Cant play league in Full screen
body:
So this morning i downloaded the 7.1 patch and i got into a game and after i picked my champ the normal league Logo shosw up and i was like ya running smooth and then like a blue thing came like something is wrong whit my resolution playing full screen but when i do the thing that it says on the client to press "Alt+enter" it can be temporarly fixed so i can play and when i do that it works but i cant see my champio or my map cant move my camera and i tried editing the resolution when i do "alt+enter" so i can play untill riot fixes it and i just wanna ask you guys do you know what sould i do or do i need to wait for riot to fix this kinda bug ill call it. And if you can help me please do so il be thankful for all of the help .





Im sorry if i am spaming but i just want to see if any 1 else is having this problem and when is it going to be fixed?

replies.body:
This is an issue that's being looked into per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, and while there are some workarounds I can't guarantee any fixes just yet.  There is a secondary work around that might be able to help:

Log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

I suggest testing it out in a custom game to prevent any penalties.  I hope it helps, but if not then keep updated on that status page.
